avdta.network.node

Class Intersection

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.node.Location
      • avdta.network.node.Node
        • avdta.network.node.Intersection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Node>, ICoordinate, MapMarker, MapObject

    public class Intersection
extends Node
    An intersection in the traffic network. Each intersection has an IntersectionControl that specifies vehicle movement
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Intersection

        public Intersection(int id,
                    IntersectionControl control)
        Instantiates Intersection with Location (0, 0) and specified control. Null control is acceptable for instantiation but not for simulation
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Node
        control - the intersection control

      • Intersection

        public Intersection(int id,
                    Location loc,
                    IntersectionControl control)
        Instantiates Intersection with specified control. Null control is acceptable for instantiation but not for simulation
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Node
        loc - the Location of this Node
        control - the intersection control
